title: Hard Skills vs. Soft Skills in Transitions
description: One-minute skill: Hard Skills vs. Soft Skills in Transitions.

hook.text: Python expires in relevance. Leadership does not. Understanding this distinction changes how you plan.

buildup.text: Hard skills are technical: coding, accounting, design. They're often industry-specific and perishable.

discovery.text: Soft skills are universal: communication, problem-solving, adaptability. They transfer across every career.

twist.text: LinkedIn data shows soft skills are the #1 factor in hiring decisions, ahead of technical qualifications.

punchline.text: Hard skills get interviews. Soft skills get careers.
